titleStmt.title: The continual follovving of the French king vpon the Duke of Parma, the Duke of Guise, the Duke of Maine, and their armies From the seuenteenth of Aprill, vntill the 20. of the same month. Togither with the honourable attempts of Sir Roger Williams and his men.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and Edvvard White, and are to be solde at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
